post.author: 허현옥

comment.author: 부기흡
comment.content:
You're the man! The best storyboard-er in the world :-)

Yes, we might need to get a customer sign-off after internal review. By the way I suggest that this project needs a short break until next year. Let's discuss tonight.

Could you also send a note to Mr. Lee (for Ruby) if he could come online?

comment.author: 허현옥
comment.content: I sent a mail to Mr.Lee and also mention about on line and off line meeting too

post.content:
감동의 순간이네요...

스토리 보드 그려보니 38 장이네요.... 보이는 화면만...
여기서도 조금씩은 아직 수정과 협의(?) 가 필요할듯 하네요..

담에 또 프로젝트할때는 절대로 스토리보드 안 맡을래요...ㅜ_ㅜ;
시간 너무 오래 걸렸어요....
post.title: 38 pages Storyboard is uploaded... :\\'(
